name: Empire
overview:
Empire is an hour-long Western television series set on a 1960s 500,000-acre ranch in New Mexico, starring Richard Egan, Terry Moore, and Ryan O'Neal. It ran on NBC from September 25, 1962, to May 14, 1963.

In the second abbreviated season, from September 24 to December 31, 1963, it was renamed Redigo after Egan's title character, Jim Redigo, the general manager of the fictitious Garrett ranch in Empire, and reduced to a half-hour.

episodes.name: The Day the Empire Stood Still
Ballard Number One
episodes.overview: Sam Ballard's embezzling killed Redigo's father. Now Sam's back---digging for oil near the Garret ranch.

episodes.name: A Place to Put a Life
episodes.overview: Redigo returns to the small ranch his father left him and finds that it's being run by a teen-ager.

episodes.name: Ride to a Fall
episodes.overview: Dahlbeck's guest at a ranch party seems to wield an eerie hold over him.

episodes.name: Long Past, Long Remembered
episodes.overview: Wealthy Tom Cole visits the spread during a severe drought and his untimely friendliness suggests he wants to buy the ranch.

episodes.name: Walk Like a King
episodes.overview: Ex-employee Barney Swanton returns to the ranch rich but is still envious of Redigo, whose job he always wanted.

episodes.name: The Fire Dancer
episodes.overview: Story of a raging oil-well fire and the man who offers to put it out.

episodes.name: The Earth Mover
episodes.overview: Glenn Kassin wants to build a model city near Mesa, but the landowner refuses to sell.

episodes.name: Pressure Lock
episodes.overview: In the midst of negotiating for oil rights, Redigo is called out of town---leaving Tal to handle the bargaining.

episodes.name: Echo of a Man
episodes.overview: Worries over his pretty young ward are causing a drop in efficiency for chief engineer Tabor.

episodes.name: When the Gods Laugh
episodes.overview: A sharecropper who objects to education uses abusive tactics to keep his son home from school.

episodes.name: Stopover on the Way to the Moon
episodes.overview: After taking young Skip Wade to court for vandalism, Redigo determines to make the youth a useful citizen.

episodes.name: The Four Thumbs Story
episodes.overview: A Native American war veteran's penchant for violence is isolating him from his friends, neighbors and family.

episodes.name: End of an Image
episodes.overview: Janet Rainey claims she's just going shopping---but there are those who suspect she's leaving town.

episodes.name: The Loner
episodes.overview: Mike Novak wants to work on the Garret spread until he's paid for a mare of his choice, but his choice is Tal's favorite.

episodes.name: No Small Wars
episodes.overview: Adding urgency to his surgery-or-death status, Redigo's sick friend is a very uncooperative patient.

episodes.name: The Tiger Inside
episodes.overview: Afraid that a volunteer posse may take the law into its own hands, Redigo joins the hunt for a man accused of robbery.

episodes.name: Season of Growth
episodes.overview: Connie's former beau is back at the ranch---expressing a new interest in working and a renewed interest in her.

episodes.name: Seven Days on Rough Street
episodes.overview: After claiming he doesn't need the security of the Garret ranch, Tal leaves for Delgado---on the bet he can't stay a week.

episodes.name: A House in Order
episodes.overview: News of her fatal illness inspires Lucia to establish a better relationship between son Tal and foreman Redigo.

episodes.name: Down There, the World
episodes.overview: The mine shuts down when the heady enchantress running a vital processing plant decides to buy out the Garrets.

episodes.name: Burnout
episodes.overview: Forest Ranger Tom Barton has problems: the Garret logging operation is violating the timber contract with the Forest Service--and logging foreman Chris Norden is a tough guy to deal with.

episodes.name: Nobody Dies on Saturday
episodes.overview: Prison escapee Quinn Serrato is out to find his old boss---Redigo, the man who turned him in.

episodes.name: 65 Miles Is a Long, Long Way
episodes.overview: A woman stands in the way of Redigo's cattle drive by asking too much to cross her property.

episodes.name: Duet for Eight Wheels
episodes.overview: Paralysis overcomes Redigo after he is trampled by a wild stallion.

episodes.name: Between Friday and Monday
episodes.overview: Moreno attempts to offset the fears of a young girl in a town full of hot-blooded cowboys.
